text:
ESRS E1-7 GHG removals and GHG mitigation projects financed through
carbon credits
Question ID 432 – Net zero target and GHG removals
Release date
July 2024
Question asked
ESRS E1 paragraph 60 mentions the words ‘after approximately 90-95% of GHG reduction’.
(1) Does this mean that under ESRS my claim to net-zero will not be recognised if I neutralise
20% of my total reduction target to reach net-zero through removal techniques?
